subject: Fwd: A heartfelt message from me to you
description_text:
---------- Thư đã chuyển tiếp ---------
Từ: Long Nguyen <longnguyenjp.mei@gmail.com>
Ngày: Th 4, 24 thg 12, 2025 lúc 16:53
Tiêu đề: A heartfelt message from me to you
Đến: <service@simsonn.com>, <support@simsonn.com>


Dear Simsonn Team,

I normally wouldn't write an email like this, but I feel I have no other
choice but to speak honestly from my heart.

Over the past weeks, I've been quietly waiting and trying to be patient.
When I realized my main email address (longnguyenhm.ktv@gmail.com) might
have been blocked, it truly hurt me. Not because of the money alone, but
because it makes me feel ignored and powerless.

I know this commission amount is very small compared to your company’s
scale. For you, it may be almost nothing. But for me, it is different. I am
not a large agency or a big partner — I am just one individual trying to
make a living through my work.

I put genuine effort into promoting your brand, believing in a fair and
respectful partnership. This commission means paying my basic expenses and
supporting my family. Waiting without clarity has caused me a lot of stress
and sleepless nights, especially as the year comes to an end.

I am not asking for charity. I am only asking for what I have already
earned through honest work. I truly hope you can understand how important
this payment is to me, even if it seems insignificant from your side.

If there has been any misunderstanding or mistake on my part, I sincerely
apologize. I just hope you can see me not as a number, but as a real person
who has tried his best.

Thank you for reading this message. I still believe in goodwill and hope
for your kindness and support.

Sincerely,
David Long

Hi Long Nguyen,    We have received your message. Please rest assured that the commission will definitely be paid. Normally, commissions for orders placed in November are paid in January, with about a one-month interval. This is to allow time for handling any potential refunds or return risks.  In addition, we have not blocked or frozen your account. Please kindly check where your email might have been blocked — whether it is on the promotion platform’s side or elsewhere.

Dear Simsonn Team,

Thank you for your response and for the clarification.

However, I would like to kindly clarify a few points regarding my
commission payments.

First, the commission I am referring to includes *orders placed in
September*. According to your explanation (with commissions being paid
after approximately two months), this commission should have been paid in
*November*. As it is now *the end of December*, I have still not received
this payment.

Additionally, regarding *August*, there are *two orders for which the
commission was underpaid / not paid*. I would appreciate it if you could
also review these August orders and confirm the missing commission amounts.

Therefore, I kindly ask you to check the status of my outstanding
commissions for *both August and September*, and advise on the *exact
payment timeline*.

Thank you very much for your assistance. I look forward to your reply.

Best regards,

David Long

Hi Long Nguyen,  Okay, I have informed our operations team to start processing. Due to the busy peak season in November, many emails were delayed, resulting in more than ten support tickets from your side. By the way, we usually provide affiliate links for influencers—could you let us know which promotion channels you are using?

Hi Support Team,

Thank you very much for your message and for letting me know that the
operations team has started processing. I truly appreciate your support,
especially during such a busy period.

Regarding the promotion channel, I mainly promote your products through my
own website. I focus on creating honest, content-based reviews and sharing
useful information to help users better understand the products before
making a decision.

Best regards,

David Long
